sentences.english: Sb. could fall into shit and come up smelling of roses !
sentences.chinese: 那傢伙運氣特別好，掉進糞坑裏還能揀個金元寶。

sentences.english: On the other side is afisherman's village, where people live in the worst squalor.
sentences.chinese: 在另外一邊是漁村，那個村子裏的人活在糞坑中。

sentences.english: Whatever else is unsure in this stinking dunghill of a world a mother's love is not.
sentences.chinese: 母親之愛絕非是惡臭糞坑般的世界所無法確定的東西。

sentences.english: Don't get caught up in the cesspool of mediocrity when it comes to your choice of casual footwear.
sentences.chinese: 不要陷入平庸的糞坑中，當涉及到你選擇休閒鞋。

sentences.english: America's reputation is in the toilet, while China's is on the rise.
sentences.chinese: 美國的聲譽在糞坑裏，而中國則高高在上。

sentences.english: She scavenged for firewood with one of her five children near the pits of excrement.
sentences.chinese: 她與五個兒女之一在糞坑附近撿拾柴火。

sentences.english: Manila is a complete and crime ridden cesspool.
sentences.chinese: 馬尼拉完全是犯罪糞坑。

sentences.english: American factory farms are literally filthy cesspools of their own making, and who else is cleaning up all that shit but American taxpayers?
sentences.chinese: 美國的工業化農場簡直就是業主自己建的骯髒的糞坑。

sentences.english: The lower classes of Roman society urinated into pots which were emptied into cesspools.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬下層人民將尿排在罐中然後再倒入糞坑。

sentences.english: He slid onto the cement floor and vomited as his bare body hit puddles of human waste.
sentences.chinese: 他滑倒在水泥地上，光着的身體碰到了糞坑他嘔吐了。

definition: armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to boil (of liquid)/boiling hot/Get out!/Go away!/fuck off (rude)
to choke on (food etc)/to swallow the wrong way
to claw wildly/to scratch frantically/to arrest people indiscriminately
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
to bite the hand that feeds one (idiom)
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: to fail (a student)/to pawn/(of a computer or program) to crash/to stop working
